title: Position Management UI
description: Implement position cards showing separate positions (not aggregated) with health monitoring: liquidation price, health factor, and in-app warnings when health factor is low

title: Transaction history filters
description: Add filters to History page by transaction type (mint, swap, stake, leverage, etc.)

title: Morpho Lending Integration
description: Implement Morpho lending features: provide liquidity to lending pool, borrow USDC against staked collateral, repay debt / withdraw collateral, display live APY and user's supplied amount
